snippet.title: 1.5 Years of Unity Game Development in 10 minutes | Fireworks Mania
snippet.description:
# FIREWORKS MANIA ON STEAM
➤ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1079260?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=youtube_video

In this video I go through how the first 1.5 years of sparetime game development looked like for me, as I'm now preparing for initial release in about 5-6 months!

- Enjoy!

# PEOPLE PLAYING FIREWORKS MANIA
➤ https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfRfKfCcFo_vIxxYpVQ-vNg8KfEX4r_Y-

# ALSO CHECK OUT THESE VIDEOS
➤ A day in the life of a game dev with a full time day job
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GJfdvpVJRHg
➤ Physics Tool Updates
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HlEchI59wHM
➤ Fireworks Mania Weekly Game Dev Log Playlist
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfRfKfCcFo_s49jOqbJv9rZBOHAdBLgFf


# ... AND IF YOU ARE A GAME DEV
➤ Let's Create A Half Life Physics Gun In Unity3d
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZnWfChctC9M


# SOCIAL
Discord: https://discord.gg/SzZD77p
Twitter: https://twitter.com/laumania
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/laumania

# GAME DESCRIPTION
FIREWORKS MANIA is an small casual explosive simulator game where you can play around with fireworks, create beautiful firework shows or maybe just blow up stuff.

# MUSIC
Songs from the album "20XX" and "Weekly Loops" by Evan King
https://evankingmusic.com

Songs from StreamBeats by Harris Heller
https://open.spotify.com/playlist/4kAqBBEZQsBIXMIJl6u8tO

"Whoopsy" by Audionautix is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
Artist: http://audionautix.com/


# AWESOME YOUTUBERS TO CHECK OUT!
If you enjoyed this video, you might also like some of these that I watch and are inspired by:

Dani (You might not know this small channel - but he is really funny)
Dani - They Said I Couldn't Make an Online Multiplayer Game... So I Made One!
https://youtu.be/TtdBAA3hCxY
Dani - I Made a Game in 48 Hours!
https://youtu.be/gzPGmR6R67Y
Dani - I Made a 3D Game To Prove Him Wrong (Part 2)
https://youtu.be/nYIbDAW950s
Dani - He said I Couldn't Make a 3D Game... So I Made One!
https://youtu.be/rb0EhmyQ0aM
Dani - Programming a Boss Battle For my Game
https://youtu.be/nhhSDrA6stw

Brackeys (A fellow Dane here on YouTube doing Unity Tutorials - I subbed back when he made the videos in his room at his parents)
Brackeys - How to make a Video Game in Unity - BASICS (E01)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IlKaB1etrik
Brackeys - How to make a Video Game - Getting Started
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j48LtUkZRjU
Brackeys  - How to make a 2D Game in Unity
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=on9nwbZngyw
Brackeys - FIREWORKS in Unity using VFX Graph!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iCEHarLRCzI

DevDuck (Also subbed to Ben here when he started and made his first game)
DevDuck - Starting Development of My Dream Game
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k5bb1IRzJbQ
DevDuck - How to Become a Morning Person
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T-953H5QLhM
DevDuck - A Day in the Life of a Game Developer with a Full Time Job
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_I51sqsDR-M

Jonas Tyroller (Also subbed for a long time to Jonas here, he have some very education video about game development)
Jonas Tyroller - We Made 357 Games With Intentional Bugs
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j47JMlwEp_U
Jonas Tyroller - How to make Your First Game TODAY! - (Unity 3D)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pCBqgREiSUE
Jonas Tyroller - Can We Make This Button Fun To Press?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7L1B5YaxxoA


#devlog #fireworks #gamedev #gamedevelopment #unity3d #madewithunity #indiedev #indiegame
